text: Alan Crawford may refer to: *Alan Crawford (Australian rules footballer) (1916-1988), Australian rules footballer *Alan Crawford (English footballer) (born 1953), English footballer and manager *Alan Pell Crawford (born 1953), American author and journalist *Allan Crawford (music publisher) Australian music publisher who formed the sales and programming company for Radio Atlanta ==See also== *Allen Crawford (born 1968), author and illustrator
title: Alan Crawford
